description: Boasting a fresh, top-quality feel, La Kuccagna is run by a young and energetic management team. The menu features meat and fish dishes alike, including cuts of meat cooked over the ever-present barbecue grill. An excellent wine list including labels from outside Italy, an exquisite rural location and a modern, comfortable decor complete the picture.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
